title: 这是什么情况？
author: 企业123
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why is it breaking :(

Time: 14-10-24 下午7:47
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: RedStoneMC
replies.txt_content: NEI不行或者forge不行，换个MC吧（无图无真相）
